value.title: Create your first Power BI report (2021)
value.excerpt: New to Power BI? Adam helps you get started with creating your first Power BI report in Power BI Desktop! Start your journey the right way! value.title: Power BI Developer in a Day
value.excerpt: The Power BI Developer in a Day online course empowers you as an app developer with the technical knowledge required to embed Power BI content. We recommend you watch the videos in the recorded sequence, starting with video 1 and ending with video 20.

topItems.title: Welcome and Course Introduction | Power BI Developer in a Day
topItems.excerpt: In this video, Peter Myers (Microsoft Most Valued Professional, and course developer) welcomes you to the course. It is video 1 of 21. value.title: 20 tricks to finally master the Matrix visualization in Power BI!!
value.excerpt: The matrix visualization has over 100 configuration options, and some of the most basic functionality, like hiding subtotals is not so easy to discover.  In today's video, I will show you 20 things you can do on the matrix that will take that visualization to the next level.  Did I miss any? Let me know

value.title: Getting started with Power BI Paginated Reports (2021)

Paginated Report In a Day: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/learning-catalog/paginated-reports-online-course

value.title: Power BI REST API; What it is and Why it is Important
value.excerpt: You can interact with the Power BI objects in the Power BI Service through a set of APIs called Power BI REST API. The Power BI REST API can help automate tasks, build tools that work with Power BI, the configuration of Power BI outside of the platform, and embed Power BI into a third-party application.
